00021 #include "DataGroupHeaderReader.h"
00022 #include "DataGroupHeaderReaderTest.h"
00023 #include "FileHeaderReader.h"
00024 
00025 const std::string TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE = "../data/test.file.data_dat";
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00029 
00030 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataGroupHeaderReaderTest );
00031 
00032 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::setUp()
00033 {
00034         is.open(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::tearDown()
00038 {
00039         is.close();
00040         fh.Clear();
00041 }

00043 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::CreationTest()
00044 {
00045         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00046         fhReader.Read();
00047 
00048         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00049         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadHeaderTest()
00053 {
00054         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00055         fhReader.Read();
00056 
00057         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00058         DataGroupHeader dch;
00059         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch));
00061 
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 0);       // doesn't read in the DataSetHeader
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadOneDataGroupHeaderTest()
00069 {
00070         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00071         fhReader.Read();
00072 
00073         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00074         DataGroupHeader dch;
00075         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.Read(is, dch));
00077 
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00082 
00083         // Check that the DataSetHeader information was read.
00084         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dch.GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin != dphEnd);
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t)*100);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 100);
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 1);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00095 
00096         // Check the DataSetHeader name value pairs
00097         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00098         dphBegin->GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Scanner");
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"M10");
00102         ++nvpBegin;
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Pixel Size");
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueFloat() == 0.051f);
00106         ++nvpBegin;
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00108 
00109         // Check the data dataSet columns
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == UShortColType);
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00112 
00113         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00114         ++dphBegin;
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00116 }
00117 
00118 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadMinimumInfoForOneDataGroupHeaderTest()
00119 {
00120         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00121         fhReader.Read();
00122 
00123         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00124         DataGroupHeader dch;
00125         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.ReadMinimumInfo(is, dch));
00127 
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00132 
00133         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00134         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dch.GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 0);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == 0);
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == 0);
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 0);
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00144 
00145         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00146         ++dphBegin;
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00148 }
00149 
00150 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadAllTest()
00151 {
00152         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00153         fhReader.Read();
00154 
00155         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00156         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.ReadAll(is, fh, fhReader.GetDataGroupCnt()));
00158 
00159         // Check some header information
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh.GetDataGroupCnt() == 1);
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh.GetNumDataGroups() == 1);
00162 
00163         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(fh.GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd));
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00169 
00170         // Check that the DataSetHeader information was read.
00171         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin != dphEnd);
00174         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t)*100);
00179         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 100);
00180         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 1);
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00182 
00183         // Check the DataSetHeader name value pairs
00184         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00185         dphBegin->GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00186         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Scanner");
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"M10");
00189         ++nvpBegin;
00190         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Pixel Size");
00192         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueFloat() == 0.051f);
00193         ++nvpBegin;
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00195 
00196         // Check the data dataSet columns
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == UShortColType);
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00199 
00200         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00201         ++dphBegin;
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00203 
00204         // Check that there are not any more DataGroupHeaders
00205         ++dchBegin;
00206         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin == dchEnd);
00207 }

00209 void DataGroupHeaderReaderTest::ReadAllMinimumInfoTest()
00210 {
00211         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00212         fhReader.Read();
00213 
00214         // File position is at the start of the first DataGroupHeader
00215         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00216         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchReader.ReadAllMinimumInfo(is, fh, fhReader.GetDataGroupCnt()));
00217 
00218         // Check some header information
00219         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh.GetDataGroupCnt() == 1);
00220         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fh.GetNumDataGroups() == 1);
00221 
00222         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00223         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(fh.GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd));
00224         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00225         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00226         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetDataSetPos() == 0x2d1);
00227         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin->GetNextGroupPos() == 0x468);
00228 
00229         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00230         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00231         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00232         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00233         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00234         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 0);
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == 0);
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == 0);
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 0);
00238         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00240 
00241         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00242         ++dphBegin;
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00244 
00245         // Check that there are not any more DataGroupHeaders
00246         ++dchBegin;
00247         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin == dchEnd);
00248 }
